question: My 22m/o D has a very sweet sweat smell, especially in the AM.  It can be quite strong, a sickly sweet smell, sometimes can be smelled throughout her room.  I called the peds, went this AM and she had a non-fasting blood of 75, and nothing in urine.  Is this signs of hypo, or diabetes?  We are going back for a fasting reading, and this smell issue has been happening for quite some time. Thanks!
title: Sweet Smell?
